chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has a problem as follows:
The sound of the speaker is crackling more and more as you increase the volume.
Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a portable computer or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 working days to process a refund (if you're eligible).
A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water
✔ Confirms that personal data has been deleted
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories and a proof of purchase in their package
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.
Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a portable computer or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 working days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
